Articles.Content:
This is a keychain, but i don't know the manufacturer. When i press the button which is outside in the right of the alien head (the plastic piece with dots), it gived a light on the

led (in the front of the ship).

I don't remember the color of the light, as the battery is dead. The ship can be pulled apart, to remove the battery. The plastic glass seems that it can be removed. I didn't tried to remove the battery or the plastic glass. Its lenght is 11 cm.

When i press the tail, the front spins. I don't know the manufacturer. Its lenght is 10 cm and a half.

Please, without Lego. You can tell who made the miniatures/toys if you know.

Edited June 2, 2019 by roarke
Thread moved to The Lounge, since it doesn't appear to be about KSP.
